snippet: MILLER--Arnold. We note with sorrow the passing of Arnold Miller, 83 years old, on Monday, January 18th. Beloved husband of Elaine. Devoted father to Sharon and Ken. Cherished grandfather of Brett, Kimberly and Hallie. You are in our hearts forever. Services will be held on Thursday at 10am at Westchester Reform Temple CJL. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MILLER--Arnold. We note with sorrow the passing of Arnold Miller, 83 years old, on Monday, January 18th. Beloved husband of Elaine. Devoted father to Sharon and Ken. Cherished grandfather of Brett, Kimberly and Hallie. You are in our hearts forever. Services will be held on Thursday at 10am at Westchester Reform Temple CJL. 1/3
